raw_comment: We noticed how the southern states received their "first leaf" before the northern states. We wonder why this happens. In this graph, it could be showing when different states transition into spring, which leads the trees to start growing leaves.
ace_sentences: We noticed that the southern states received their first leaf before the northern states.
This graph could show when different states transition into spring.
If a state transitions into spring, then the trees in this state start growing leaves.
